title: WE have a gift card for a business that is now closed. Do we have any way of collecting?
question: We were given a gift card in June. We went to use it in Sept and the Business was closed. Any suggestions on ways to proceede?
answers: Unfortunately there is no realistic remedy. Even if you wanted to file a claim in small claims court for the value of the card, and won a judgment, collecting on it would likely be more trouble than it's worth (assuming the value isn't thousands of dollars).
It's probably a total loss. If the business has filed for bankruptcy, you may have the ability to file a claim, but it's unlikely you would receive much.
